entry.data:
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
CALM WINDS

SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
